room_title: Escape room "The Legacy" by Headzup in Las Vegas
review: While visiting Las Vegas, my teenage son and I went here to do our first escape room. We did "The Legacy".  It was there toughest room. Even though we didn't escape, we had a great time. The staff was very helpful.

room_title: Escape room "The Legacy" by Headzup in Las Vegas
review: The legacy room was really fun and challenging . In game Design is very high level. Staff was really cool too

room_title: Escape room "The Legacy" by Headzup in Las Vegas
review: Our group's host was really outgoing and enthusiastic! The Legacy was quite challenging but a fun experience.
